org.svvrl.goal.core.io
Class LogicCodec<L extends Logic,H extends FormulaHolder<L>>

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
      org.svvrl.goal.core.io.LogicCodec<L,H>
Type Parameters:
L - the type of the logic
H - the type of the holder for L
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
Direct Known Subclasses:
ACTLCodec, ORECodec, QPTLCodec, RECodec
public abstract class LogicCodec<L extends Logic,H extends FormulaHolder<L>>
extends XMLCodec

A LogicCodec provides methods for encoding a formula as an XML file in GOAL file format (GFF) and decoding the XML file back to the formula.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
